title: compounds_and_analytes
description: Array of information for all analytes and administered compounds of a given profile. Contains one [object per analyte and administered compound](./docs/compounds_and_analytes-compound_and_analyte.md).

items.title: compound_and_analyte
items.description: Object describing all analytes and administered compounds for a given profile. Includes pharmacodynamic parameters and covariates

name.description: Name of the analyte or administered compound, use INN where available

alias.description: Alias of the analyte or administered compound. Enter when compound name is confidential.

meta:enum.compound (exogenous): The analyte is a xenobiotic, such as metoprolol.
meta:enum.compound (endogenous): The analyte is an endogenous compound, such as CRP.
meta:enum.pd parameter: The analyte is a pharmacodynamic parameter, such as heart rate.
meta:enum.covariate: The analyte is a covariate such as creatinine clearance.

molecular_weight.description: Molecular weight in case the analyte is a compound.

pubchem_id.description: Pubchem identifier in case the analyte is a compound.
